forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High near 15C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with mainly sunny skies later in the day as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High around 55F. Winds NW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Gusty winds early. Low 46F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
